website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for a solid outdoor clock with an indoor option should consider this model from Infinity Instruments. Very appealing for pool or patio use.
pros: Suitable for both indoor and outdoor uses, especially patios
Heavy-duty slate frame and easy to read dial
cons: Some customers say outdoor use is limited
Quality control issues reported with clock mechanism
Thermometer and hygrometer may be more ornamental than functional

customer_reviews.title: Infinity Instruments in/outdoor clock lacks manufacturing quality control.  Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace the first clock. Minute had was not correctly connected to the time mechanism and would not go around. Amazon was very efficient in how returns are handled. Replaced with same product from Infinity Instruments. This time the hour hand just dangled to the number six -- again not attached. Poor or terrible manufacturing and quality control. And again Amazon was excellent with immediate support on how to return. Am sending today and will buy a different clock.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to the reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I took my chances and ordered this clock, and although it’s lovely, it arrived with one of the hands having fallen out of place. It cannot be opened to reattach it. So now I will try to return it and look elsewhere for a patio clock. I won’t reorder since so many others have had problems with the hands not moving, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer and Hygrometer don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this clock to replace a old 24" atomic clock that looks exactly like this one. Clock looks good.The bad is the thermometer and hygrometer have not moved even at night when the news says it's 45 the clock still says 70. Also clock shipped with no battery. I've never bought anything that didn't come with at least a cheap off brand battery. I bought it for the clock so i'm keeping it, if I had bought from a store I would probably exchange it for one with a working thermometer and hygrometer.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Hojur hand doesn't keep time.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item twice. On both of them, the hour hand would not keep time. Must have been a bad batch of clock mechanisms when this was manufactured. Too bad as this is a sturdy nice looking clock with real slate. Also the temperature dial was 22 degrees off and the hygrometer was 18% off; however, these can be adjusted to display the correct temp and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price 4 star +
customer_reviews.text: Have had this Clock for four months now. Very attractive for the price--we found this exact same unit at a Patio Store for about $80 more. Easy decision to go with Amazon. The mosaic inserts are sturdy. We hang it on a Wall outdoors under a covered patio. The temperature seems off 1-2 degrees, otherwise would give it 5 stars. Reliability/quality--only time will tell. Call it 4 stars +.
customer_reviews.author: Danyn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice clock
customer_reviews.text: We had a smaller clock made by this company which I dropped. Amazingly the clear cover broke but the clock continued to work. Thought I would like it in a bigger size and I do. It's very good looking and I know it's good quality from having the first one
customer_reviews.author: L. H. LAIRD

customer_reviews.title: Looks good from a distance
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the clock for 3 days and I like the looks of it from a distance. There is a spray of grey on the face of the clock that makes it look dirty. I thought it was an imperfection from the factory but my husband says it's supposed to be like that to make it look weathered. My friend has the same clock and her face is white. I'll write another review in 6 months and tell you how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Carder

customer_reviews.title: Works. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for inside and one to replace an outside clock very similar to this. The outside one was not in direct sunshine, but still the face cracked and disintegrated after a while in our harsh weather. It lasted a few years, however, which is not bad for our area.
customer_reviews.author: Wittily Writ Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, but does not keep time
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love the look of this clock. It is heavy and appears to be high-quality. I bought it last summer and it worked fairly well. When it got colder outside, I stored it indoors and took out the batteries. Now that it is warmer, I put new batteries back in, set the time, and moved it outdoors. The minute hand appears to be keeping time, but the hour hand does not move at an hourly rate. It is completely wrong about 2 hours after setting the time. Well, at least it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Ham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful in our kitchen. The humidity and thermometer are very helpful to have in the kitchen especially in the dry winter New England air. It’s a bit heavy but nothing an anchor and screw can’t handle.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Handsome clock
customer_reviews.text: Great looking clock. The bezel is all made with slate. The hands are already becoming pitted after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock. Big
customer_reviews.text: Nice clock. Big ,will see how long it last .Every year will change the battery.Hope it will work for at least 3 to 4 years
customer_reviews.author: Chop

customer_reviews.title: nice outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: put this on patio and it looks really nice with the "natural" theme of the backyard and pool.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few months. Bought once at a department store and once on Amazon. Complete waste of money other than something interesting to look at. Neither one worked for more than a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Adec

customer_reviews.title: product needs to work!
customer_reviews.text: Clock looks good but does not hold up to outside weather. Second clock that we have purchased. It stops working and we would not buy another
customer_reviews.author: JoyceH

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pool Clock
customer_reviews.text: We have this clock hung outside by our swimming pool. It has held up well in the elements. It does slow down or stops all together during cold weather. The clock looks good and works well most of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lester

customer_reviews.title: It's fairly heavy
customer_reviews.text: The quality in the stone work and completely satisfied !
customer_reviews.author: Barbi Lambert

customer_reviews.title: We put a battery in and it seems to work fine, and will hang it on our patio wall ...
customer_reviews.text: We just got the clock and my wife loves it. We put a battery in and it seems to work fine, and will hang it on our patio wall (shaded area) and go from there. Hard to tell if there are any issues as we've only had it for one day. But since my wife is happy with it.........
customer_reviews.author: xmolekiller

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock
customer_reviews.text: We put this out by the pool when the last "outdoor" clock we bought died from the heat. So far so go!
customer_reviews.author: gocode03

customer_reviews.title: High quality clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock to replace a similar one that had a broken hour hand. This clock is much better quality and it shows. Item was double boxed to keep it from getting damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JennKenn

customer_reviews.title: I think it’s best if you have it under a covered patio glass longer like we have
customer_reviews.text: Great looking clock. I think it’s best if you have it under a covered patio glass longer like we have
customer_reviews.author: J Leslie Brier

customer_reviews.title: Looks great outdoors. Has been in use 3 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great outdoors. Has been in use 3 months and haven't seen and degradation.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan N

customer_reviews.title: I love this clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! It really looks nice out at our pool. I will take it in over the winter to make sure nothing happens to it. It keeps great time, and it has real stone, so it DO NOT look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gale M. Bettinger

customer_reviews.title: quality clock
customer_reviews.text: have had this clock in the past, very happy to find a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a bit dirty and AA battery was already in it when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to be used, a bit dirty and AA battery was already in it when I received it, wish I would have read the reviews also, after just 6 months hour hand dangling at the six. Tried to fix it and ended up breaking the glass front.
customer_reviews.author: amymac

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The hour hand stopped going round and is always at the number 6.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches our patio very nicely. A very heavy clock
customer_reviews.text: Matches our patio very nicely. A very heavy clock. Make sure it is secured properly. Has been working flawlessly for a couple months now.
customer_reviews.author: Art R. Walicki

customer_reviews.title: Stone frame is beautiful and an excellent size for the
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Stone frame is beautiful and an excellent size for the patio
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: But bought one for our daughter and her family as loved it also
customer_reviews.text: Larger then thought. But bought one for our daughter and her family as loved it also.
customer_reviews.author: Lori McBride

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: 1 year old and it not working. Hour hand just falls - was put away during winter months. Took it out and its shot. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old one and "my she who must be obeyed" loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt keep time!
customer_reviews.text: loved the look of the clock, but didn't keep time at all. I bought 2 and it was the same with both.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R.

customer_reviews.title: Two years after purchase it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Super purchase, looks great...runs great two years after our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DLTHOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time, easy to hang. Works like a Charm
customer_reviews.author: Bugs

customer_reviews.title: I returned it and a replacement was sent immediately which pleased me. Clock is nice looking and keeps good ...
customer_reviews.text: First order came with a cracked glass. I returned it and a replacement was sent immediately which pleased me. Clock is nice looking and keeps good time. Not sure how to set temp and barometer but think it may be accurate as well. We have it outdoors in our courtyard.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marx

customer_reviews.title: The easy of ordering and the speed I received it
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and how it is just the right size for where I wanted to put it
customer_reviews.author: mary centrone

customer_reviews.title: handsome clock
customer_reviews.text: Clock is beautiful and goes perfectly with the tile in our patio. We are very pleased with the clock. thanks
customer_reviews.author: sallyk

customer_reviews.title: This clock is beautiful and so far keeps very good time
customer_reviews.text: This clock is beautiful and so far keeps very good time . It is in the sun most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine phaneuf

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock
customer_reviews.text: Love the look; just can't have the sun shine on it or the temperature reads incorrectly. For the shade, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not for long!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking clock, great size for the covered poolouse, and after 2 years weathered quite well in a covered location. Unfortunately, I now understand why it is only given a one year warranty... 1.5 years later the hour hand got stuck in the thermometer needle, and although I was able to release it, it continues to hang up and offset the time.
customer_reviews.author: M Rock

customer_reviews.title: exterior nice internal mech not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: the clock is very attactive, but the timing mechanism is really cheap. I stored the clock this winter face up and when i pulled it out to hang it this spring the hour hand does became loose. There is no access to fix it so i had to throw it away. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this clock! mine lasted 2months! Unfortunately, the return policy is only 1 month . Seriously, 1 month??? What a waste of money. This also makes me re-think future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Zapp

customer_reviews.title: Get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: It looks as advertised and works well. It is a clock and was the right look for our room. Happy we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: GPOhio

customer_reviews.title: It was packed and shipped very protected and we are all pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a condo association pool wall and everyone loves it and it is working well. It was packed and shipped very protected and we are all pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie in  Florida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great next to our hot tub! We're really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great outside clock!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and accurate. Looks great outside by the pool and easy to read from far away!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Weakley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but hour hand does not keep accurate time
customer_reviews.text: Clock hour hand stopped working correctly after 3 months. Looks great but hour hand does not keep accurate time. Minute hand is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Bercun

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clock but not for Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: The clock is beautiful and the thermometer works great. However, we gave it to my parent for Christmas and the clock does not work in the cold weather of Colorado. And that is the main part of the face. Not sure what we'll do as it would be expensive to ship back to return the item. It should not be advertised as an outdoor clock in colder regions.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry W

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the hands don't line up exactly correctly and there's no way to adjust it
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This clock looks great, but it didn't even last a year. Purchased last July, and as of March the hour hand had stopped working already. Would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: SQ

customer_reviews.title: Inca - In/Outdoor Clocks with Slate Mosaic Border
customer_reviews.text: Matched my patio and decor perfectly and exactly what I wanted and haven't been able to find. Looks expensive. Can view it from my pool
customer_reviews.author: P. Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clock
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by the quality of this indoor/outdoor clock! Sometimes it's hard to tell online just what you are ordering. This clock is beautiful. The slate mosaic border is really attractive. The product arrived right away and was packaged well as to not get damaged. This was ordered as a gift for someone so I cannot speak as to it's functioning.
customer_reviews.author: LPA

customer_reviews.title: We really like the clock
customer_reviews.text: We really like the clock, it is just the right size, matches our decor and keeps time. Some of the reviews complained about the clock not keeping time, however, we've had ours over two months and it has neither gained or lost time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this clock. Our last outdoor clock was very lightweight and the wind blew it off the wall and it shattered. This clock heavier and hangs nice. It’s large enough to be seen from the pool and is gorgeous to look at!!
customer_reviews.author: shirley garant

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking clock
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking clock. Only has actual numbers on half of it. Much, much bigger than in picture. Easy to see. Colors will go with almost any color house.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stone edging
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the dark white color that serves as the primary color on the clock, since it makes it harder to read the time. Real stone is beautiful. Enclosed backbmay keep face from warping from humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Galante

customer_reviews.title: Lovely clock that doesn’t keep time
customer_reviews.text: This clock is large and gorgeous and looked so pretty on our patio. Unfortunately, it doesn’t keep proper time. I changed the batteries just to make sure that wasn’t the problem. I’ll have to return the clock. Darn because it really is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Clover M

customer_reviews.title: Really great by the pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy clock, seems to be well-made. Better than I expected. We are really enjoying it out by our pool. We really only bought it to tell the time, so I haven't paid much attention to the other measures it offers.
customer_reviews.author: goal13keep

customer_reviews.title: A great clock for our pool deck
customer_reviews.text: Works very well after having it now for a few months. Really beautiful and heavy weight for our outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great looking clock
customer_reviews.text: hour hand became loose and quit working. There was no way to simply take the unit apart and fix. It is a great looking clock.
customer_reviews.author: Cedarburg Dad

customer_reviews.title: Tempurature & humidity  inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Clock is beautiful, keeps time okay, but temperature and humidity gage doe not work correctly unless it is over 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Rose C.

customer_reviews.title: Clock does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased clock less 1 month ago and does not keep time! Very disappointed as I was so excited to get this clock...
customer_reviews.author: texy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let it fall into the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Use under a palm tree at the deep end of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: We both love it. no malfunction yet
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my girlfriend. We both love it. no malfunction yet. ( 2 months ).
customer_reviews.author: G. D. HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed that is not suitable for direct sun exposure since ...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that is not suitable for direct sun exposure since it is an outside clock. It is a nice looking clock, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sad
customer_reviews.text: we bought this clock 1 1/2 yrs ago. it's beautiful, but it doesn't keep time. stops. replace battery. stops again. so what do you do with a beautiful clock that doesn't keep time?
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne Ombadykow

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy the money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The face is basically a piece of paper, Very disappointing. We returned it. The best part of the transaction was getting a full refund
customer_reviews.author: DrJerry

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and works well. Has survived several outdoor storms, so hopefully we will be good for the future.
customer_reviews.author: H Glynn

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous clock
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful outdoor clock. Very heavy, as the slate is real, but no problems with it hanging on my deck wall. Has the humidity and barometer also, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: clbits

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The clock is of great quality and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne G Button

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE this clock
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE this clock...is the 2nd one we bought because the first one broke. Best outdoor clock on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Olds

customer_reviews.title: Nice inside
customer_reviews.text: A nice medium size clock. The slate color is very muted which looks especially nice on a wall across the room from our natural stone fireplace
customer_reviews.author: PNL

customer_reviews.title: It's Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and fit's my decor great. I was given one for a gift which I have at another house. The picture does not do it justice
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and keeps time
customer_reviews.text: My Mom loves this clock. Good quality and keeps time.
customer_reviews.author: JR Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock! I have one in MN and one in CA!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Horsager

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking clock
customer_reviews.text: My living room has a brick wall with a gas fireplace in one corner and some slate flooring areas as well. This was the perfect accent for the room.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking clock--very heavy. But the humidity gauge did not work on ours.. The clock works fine and the temperature gauge works accurately. If you do not care about the humidity then it is a great clock
customer_reviews.author: gore2085

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased an 18" slate clock for much less money and was disappointed that it was only 18"
customer_reviews.text: I placed a 24" outdoor clock in the search. This clock kept coming up. I had purchased an 18" slate clock for much less money and was disappointed that it was only 18". Therefore, for the price I paid for this clock, and the fact that it kept coming up as 24", I really thought it was a different clock than what I had purchased previously and been disappointed in the size. Alas, it was the same 18" slate clock for more money:(
customer_reviews.author: Diane J. Puopolo

customer_reviews.title: It"s really nice to get something that is just what you expected
customer_reviews.text: It"s really nice to get something that is just what you expected. Arrived well packaged no damage. Heavy like it said, but not too much to be a problem. Monkey hook on an interior wall works fine. Everyone notices it and want's to know where we found it. Love this clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock, but sealed battery means once it goes, it's useless
customer_reviews.text: We loved the clock on the outside patio and a lot of people commented on how nice it looked. However, the battery is sealed and even a jeweler/watch maker can't get it open to replace. Friends of ours also purchased the is clock around the same time, with the same result. A lot of money for such a short life-span.
customer_reviews.author: jma

customer_reviews.title: Clock Hour-Hand is off...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months, the hour-hand would fall behind - 1-2 hours. At first I thought it was a battery problem and that it was just behind... maybe a battery issue. After several replacements, I realized the minutes-hand was always right, but the hour-hand would be 1 or 2 hours behind. To make matters worse, return window lasts only 1 month - so no option to return this pricey useless clock. DO NOT BUY THIS CLOCK.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Schmitz

product_meta.title: Infinity Instruments Inca Indoor/Outdoor Mosaic Wall Clock
product_meta.description: Infinity Instruments The Inca is an ideal indoor/outdoor wall clock with its slate designed case this beautiful clock has the look and feel of the outdoors. With its hygrometer and thermometer you'll be able to keep up-to-date with what is going on in your own backyard.
feature_bullets: 18.5 Real Slate Wall Clock with Thermometer and Hygrometer to Read Humidity
Operated by a highly accurate quartz movement

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars125 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
